General.Name: Krida Jaringan Nusantara Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Krida Jaringan Nusantara Tbk provides courier services in Indonesia. It also offers freight forwarding services; bulk and digital mail solutions; mailroom management solutions; and mover solutions. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Krida Jaringan Nusantara Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Grafindo Karya Nusantara.
General.Address: Jalan Kramat VI No. 2. RT.1/RW.1, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10430
